nodes.bodyText: ✏️ I think ImmutableList.of would work here as well

They would both work but we do not need the defensive copy and it looks like we do not currently use Guava directly in the factory implementations currently.  Given the issues we have had with Guava version upgrades, I would rather keep the Guava free version for now.

I named it as a single word since that is how Solr currently treats the word.  They used to treat it as two words but shifted towards it being a single word in later versions.
https://lucene.apache.org/solr/guide/8_5/config-sets.html
